analysis.key_quote: I oppose the new rule Docket ID: OPM-2025-004 / RIN 3206-A080 that the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) has proposed that will reclassify 50,000 federal workers, making it easier to fire them for political reasons.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization and the erosion of trust in the nonpartisan civil service, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
